verses.text: Anywhere with Jesus I can safe-ly go, Anywhere He leads me in this world below; Anywhere without Him dearest joys would fade, Anywhere with Jesus I am not afraid.
Anywhere with Jesus I am not alone, Other friends may fail me, He is still my own; Tho' His hand may lead me o-ver drear-y ways, Anywhere with Jesus is a house of praise.
Anywhere with Jesus I can go to sleep, When the dark-'ning shad-ows round about me creep; Knowing I shall wak-en nev-er more to roam, Anywhere with Jesus will be home, sweet home.

chorus.text: Anywhere! anywhere! Fear I can-not know; Anywhere with Jesus I can safe-ly go.
